actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Sonic Pulses or one Bite and two Slams.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 24 (4d8+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 20 (4d6+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Sonic Pulse
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 21 (4d8+3) thunder. Drake can use this action only while underwater.

actions.name: Buffeting Blast (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales powerful stream of water in 60' line × 5 ft. wide. Each creature in line: 38 (7d10) bludgeoning damage and becomes disoriented for 1 min (DC 17 Dex half damage not disoriented). When a disoriented creature moves it moves in a random direction. It can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: Can’t use its blindsight while deafened or out of water.
